channel.title: Pages on Tammy's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Tammy's Site

item.title: About
item.description: Hey, chicos and chicas! My name is Tammy and I want to be a vet. I graduated from the University of Southampton with a BSc Honours Zoology (1:1) degree in 2020 and I am currently applying to different Vet Schools in a number of European countries. My blog is going to give you a glimpse of a mature student’s life trying to make it in to vet school. Fingers crossed that I manage to secure a place so that in the future you can read about my expiriences of my non-traditional vet student journey.
